name: Smoldering Explosion
prereq: Spell Trickster Dedication; Ability To Cast Fireball
summary: When you cast fireball, you can modify the spell to leave behind a brief cloud of smoke in its area.
description:
When you cast fireball heightened to at least 4th level, you can modify the spell to add the following to its standard effects: Your fireball leaves behind a brief cloud of smoke in its area. While it's smoke instead of mist, this cloud otherwise has the effects of obscuring mist, except that it lasts only 1 round.Smoldering Explosion Leads To...
